Text.Page: Jelena worried that the Red Raiders' stockpile of amber powder was a greater threat than expected, and asked you to help her put a stop to it.

The Red Raiders may not be the cause of this mess, but their plan isn't helping things much.

If the amber powder is causing the crystallization, gathering it all up and storing it near infected people will kill them all!

We need a better plan."Do you have anything in mind?"

We have to get rid of the powder itself, or at least neutralize it!

The Raiders are just storing it in crates and sacks. We have to get rid of it before there's an accident they can't walk away from.

Let's go.
These boxes are empty. These nearby Raiders must still have the powder on them..

Well done.

So?
Did you run into any trouble?"Sort of."

I'll shed no tears over traitors to the federation.

Now we have to find a way to destroy it. Care to have a go?

Hey!

Are you alright?

This material is too dangerous to leave in the hands of traitors. I'll take our remaining samples to the Mysterium.
